    • Getting Started

Introduction Orbitist is easy!

Step 1: Tell great stories

Collect photos, videos, text, and all of the webpages/resources needed to craft your stories.

Step 2: Map great stories

Create a map and upload your media to points.

Step 3: Share your maps

Customize, embed, and share your maps!

Step 4: Extend your maps

Build native mobile apps, incorporate data visualizations or custom base tiles, make an audio map, an interactive kiosk, a textbook, a lesson... Your maps are limited only by your imagination!

Have questions? Email: support@orbitist.com
